reviews.title: Loved by the Altamonte Springs community

ctaBanner.title: Ready for your best brows?

contact.title: 499 North State Road 434, Altamonte Springs
contact.description: Located inside Suite 101. Parking available on-site. Text or call for appointment assistance.

hero.title: Reserve your Vida Beauty Brow service
hero.description: Build your service menu, reserve your preferred time, and submit your appointment request without leaving our site. Questions? Text (689) 444-8876.

serviceMenu.title: Featured services
serviceMenu.description: Fan-favorite appointments that showcase our signature blend of artistry, skin expertise, and relaxation.

services.name: Radiance Microdermabrasion Facial
services.description: Crystal-tip exfoliation, nourishing mask, and massage to brighten, smooth, and refine skin.

services.name: Henna Brow Design
services.description: Precise mapping, brow cleanse, natural henna stain, and nourishing oil treatment for a soft powdery finish.

services.name: Permanent Makeup Consultation
services.description: Comprehensive mapping session to plan ombré brows, eyeliner, or lip blush. Deposit applies to your PMU appointment.

serviceMenu.title: Eyebrows & eyelashes
serviceMenu.description: Express detailing that keeps your brows and lashes polished between full appointments.

services.name: Eyebrow Wax
services.description: Brows shaped with gentle wax and precision finishing for clean arches.

services.name: Eyebrow Threading
services.description: Threadwork for crisp lines and a softly lifted brow shape tailored to your features.

services.name: Brow Tint
services.description: Custom-mixed brow tint to enhance shape and fill soft gaps for up to two weeks.
details: Add on to wax or threading

serviceMenu.title: Wax
serviceMenu.description: Body waxing performed with care to leave skin smooth, soft, and ready for whatever you have planned.

services.name: Under Lip
services.description: Quick under-lip wax to remove stray hairs. Perfect finishing touch to any brow service.

services.name: Half Arm Wax
services.description: From shoulder to elbow or elbow to wrist using gentle wax for long-lasting smoothness.

hero.title: Meet the artist behind Vida Beauty Brow
hero.description: A lifelong passion for beauty, artistry, and confidence-building care.

sections.title: Beauty is personal — your experience should be too
sections.body:
Vida Beauty Brow was founded to create a calm, inviting space where every client feels seen. From your first consultation to the final reveal, our mission is to pair technical mastery with warmth and education.

With advanced training in threading, microdermabrasion, and permanent makeup, Vida brings a detail-oriented approach to every service. Your brows, skin, and features are unique; the artistry we provide honors that.

sections.title: Studio principles
items: Inclusive care for all skin tones and hair textures
